doc.field: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives Collection of Communist and Socialist Serials
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives Collection of Communist and Socialist Serials

This subseries collects 64 serials and publications originating from the former Soviet Union, predominantly published in Moscow, Russia. The publications encompass news, economic reports, one-off publications memorializing significant leaders and events, and glossy pictorials featuring images of life in the USSR. Titles include Moscow News Weekly, Moscow Daily News, and News and Views, alongside publications issued by organizations including the National Council of American-Soviet Friendship, the USSR Academy of Sciences, Foreign Languages Publishing House, and the Novosti Press Agency.
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives Collection of Communist and Socialist Serials
